name: watchtower
description: Watchtower is a self-hosted automation tool that monitors running Docker containers and automatically updates them when new images are available. It operates as a background container with configuration via environment variables and CLI.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Monitor Docker containers and automatically pull and deploy new image versions when available

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Receive alerts via email, Slack, Discord, or webhooks when containers are updated

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Execute custom scripts before or after updates for backup or validation tasks

features.title: Registry Authentication
features.description: Support private Docker registries with credential management for enterprise deployments
